PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_CableSegmentTypeCoreSegment
PropertySetDef.Definition: An assembly comprising a conductor with its own insulation (and screens if any)

PropertyDef.Name: CoreIdentifier
PropertyDef.Definition: The core identification used Identifiers may be used such as by color (Black, Brown, Grey) or by number (1, 2, 3) or by IEC phase reference (L1, L2, L3) etc.

PropertyDef.Name: FunctionReliable
PropertyDef.Definition: Core maintain given properties/functions over a given (tested) time and conditions. According to (IEC) standard.

PropertyDef.Name: HalogenProof
PropertyDef.Definition: Produces small amount of smoke and irritating deaerator/gas.

PropertyDef.Name: OverallDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: The overall diameter of a core (maximun space used).

PropertyDef.Name: RatedTemperature
PropertyDef.Definition: The range of allowed temerature that a device is certified to handle. The upper bound of this value is the maximum.

PropertyDef.Name: RatedVoltage
PropertyDef.Definition: The range of allowed voltage that a device is certified to handle. The upper bound of this value is the maximum.

PropertyDef.Name: ScreenDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: The diameter of the screen around a core segment (if present).

PropertyDef.Name: SelfExtinguishing60332_1
PropertyDef.Definition: Self Extinguishing cable/core according to IEC 60332.1.

PropertyDef.Name: SelfExtinguishing60332_3
PropertyDef.Definition: Self Extinguishing cable/core according to IEC 60332.3.

PropertyDef.Name: SheathColors
PropertyDef.Definition: Colour of the core (derived from IEC 60757). Note that the combined color 'GreenAndYellow' shall be used only as Protective Earth (PE) conductors according to the requirements of IEC 60446.

PropertyDef.Name: Standard
PropertyDef.Definition: The designation of the standard applicable for the definition of the core used.
